info.description: This is the Maicare server API documentation.
info.title: Maicare API

post.description: Upload a file to the server

get.description: Get an attachment by its ID

delete.description: Delete an attachment by its ID

post.description: Refresh access token using refresh token
Authenticate user and return access and refresh tokens

post.summary: Add a document to a client
Assign an employee to a client

get.summary: List all progress reports for a client

post.summary: Create a new progress report for a client

get.summary: Retrieve a progress report for a client

put.summary: Update a progress report for a client

get.description: Get a paginated list of employee profiles with optional filters

parameters.description: Search term for employee name or number
parameters.name: search

post.description: Create a new employee profile with associated user account

get.description: Get employee profile by user ID
get.summary: Get employee profile by user ID

get.description: Get a list of certifications for employee profile
Get a list of education for employee profile
Get a list of experience for employee profile

put.description: Set employee profile picture by ID
put.summary: Set employee profile picture by ID

get.description: Get a list of all locations

put.description: Assign a role to a user

get.description: Get all permissions associated with a role ID

Bearer.description: Add 'Bearer ' prefix before your JWT token for authentication
Bearer.name: Authorization
